Setup.ChangeLanguageLater: You can modify the language settings later on if needed.
Setup.ExtraUpdateInfo: Feel free to change the frequency of the updates in the settings!
Setup.AppearanceTitle: Time to choose your favorite look!
Setup.AppearanceExtra: You can modify your looks here. But there are a few options unavailable.
Setup.ChooseLookWording: Select an appearance and see how the buttons, context menus and background adjust depending on which one you choose.
Setup.IntialSaving: All done! We're now saving your settings!
Setup.LastStepDesc: To take full advantage of ISN Forecast, we require you to confirm if the information is correct. If not please correct them.
Setup.UseEmergencyServices: Opt in to use emergency services

UVIndex.1: Low | This level isn't dangerous and no special measures have to be taken.
UVIndex.2: Low | This level isn't dangerous and no special measures have to be taken.
UVIndex.4: Medium | Wearing sunscreen is recommended & seek shade.
UVIndex.5: Medium | Wearing sunscreen is recommended, seek shade and wear a hat.
UVIndex.6: High | Being outside for a while isn't the best idea.
UVIndex.7: High | Being outside for a while isn't the best idea.
UVIndex.8: Very High | Being outside for a while isn't the best idea.
UVIndex.9: Very High | Being outside for a while isn't the best idea.
UVIndex.10: Extreme | Avoid being outside, wear sunscreen and only go outside when needed.
